yes, we saw your message the first time,
an old GeForce4 mx440SE Aopen... im using Gutsy
is your card not supported by the legacy drivers
nope... I think not.... because when I turn on my visual effects to normal .... my minimize , maximize and close button is missing in window or gui application
do any 3d games or screensavers work at a reasonable speed?
I tried it and when I restart my CPU.... the resolution have changed I cant resize my resolution to a higher value
is there a package called nvidia-glx-legacy in the repository for gutsy?
hmmmmmm that is I don't know..... im a newbie user here.... :)
start the package manager and search for nvidia, see what turns up
actually my restricted drivers are turned on
heyyyy Its okay now.... its just that i need to restart my system.. thanksss
you know I don't get it sometimes my Topbar(minimize,maximize,close) of my windows or Gui doesn't work
when i switch to visual effects normal
